clientId.description: Unique identifier for the client receiving care. This should correspond to an existing client ID. This field is mandatory.

caregiverId.description: Unique identifier for the caregiver assigned to this schedule. This can be initially unassigned or tentative and should correspond to an existing caregiver ID if provided.

date.description: The specific date of the scheduled service in YYYY-MM-DD format. This field is mandatory.

startTime.description: The start time for the scheduled service in HH:MM (24-hour) format (e.g., '09:00' or '14:30'). This field is mandatory.

endTime.description: The end time for the scheduled service in HH:MM (24-hour) format (e.g., '12:00' or '17:30'). This field is mandatory.

tasks.description: A list of specific tasks or activities to be performed during this scheduled service (e.g., 'Meal preparation', 'Assist with medication'). This field is mandatory.

status.description: The current status of the schedule (e.g., 'pending' for newly created, 'confirmed' by caregiver/client, 'completed' after service, 'cancelled'). Defaults to 'pending'.

notes.description: Any additional notes, instructions, or comments specific to this schedule entry (e.g., 'Client prefers quiet in the morning', 'Caregiver should call upon arrival').

isRecurring.description: Indicates if this schedule is part of a recurring series. Defaults to false.

recurringId.description: If part of a recurring series, this ID links all instances of the same series.
